seo.title: Contact Us - Get Support & Connect with LiftFire
seo.description: Contact LiftFire for support, partnerships, press inquiries, or feedback. Multiple ways to reach us including email, Discord, and GitHub.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.description: Have questions, feedback, or need support? We're here to help! Choose the best way to reach us based on your needs.

methods.title: Contact Methods
methods.description: Select the most appropriate channel for your inquiry to ensure you get the fastest and most relevant response.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Provide details about your inquiry, question, or feedback...
form.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.errorMessage: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again or contact us directly at support@liftfire.app.
